communications.subject: Arizona Public Records Law Request: Agency Roster (Gilbert Police Department)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Arizona Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide an electronic copy of your agency's Policy & Procedures and Complaint Form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Marcus Boyd

communications.subject: Town of Gilbert - Records Request Confirmation- GPDR2024-4930
communications.communication:
*Note: This is an automated email notification. Please do not respond to this email. 
  
   
  
 Thank you for submitting a records request to the Town of Gilbert. 
  
 We strive to complete routine requests as promptly as possible, but keep in mind that the Town of Gilbert is closed on Fridays and most government holidays. 
  
 Various factors also affect processing time, including the size and complexity of the request, nature of the records sought, and parameters provided.  The records provided to you will be based off the specific search parameters and keywords defined in your records request.   
  
 You can check the check the status of your request or access your documents by clicking on the reference number link below.  Remember to check your spam filter or junk mail folder for any email correspondence from the Town.  
  
 Reference number is Request Number: GPDR2024-4930. 
  
 Security key is 723003.  
  
   
  
 For questions regarding requests, please email to the below: 
  
  
 Public, Build (Eplan) and GIS = ClerksOffice@gilbertaz.gov.  
  
  
 Police Records = gilbertpdrecords@gilbertaz.gov. 
  
  
 EMS Records (Patient Care Reports and Billing) and Fire Reports (Incident and/or Inspection) = GFDRecordsRequest@gilbertaz.gov. 
  
  
 You must provide your security key and reference number when inquiring about your records request.   
  
   
  
 Thank you, 
  
 Town Of Gilbert 
 50 East Civic Center Drive | Gilbert, AZ 85296 
 Mon-Thurs, 7:00am - 6:00pm; Closed Fridays
